get.description: Lists gateways that exist in estrella system

parameters.name: minVersion
parameters.description: The minimal version used as filter in query

parameters.name: maxVersion
parameters.description: The maximal version used as filter in query

parameters.name: includeBorders
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will include boundary values for the version2

parameters.name: includeDevices
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will include gateway devices

parameters.name: onlyRegistered
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will display only registered gateways

parameters.name: ownedByMaintainer
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will display gateways owned by the maintainer

parameters.name: includeNbiotGateways
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will contains nbiot gateways

parameters.name: boilerSerial
parameters.description: The boiler serial. Validation rules the same as for PUT /installations/{id}/gateways/{serial}/devices{id} endpoint.

parameters.name: bmuSerial
parameters.description: The bmu serial. Validation rules the same as for PUT /installations/{id}/gateways/{serial}/devices{id} endpoint.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
limit on number of records on single page (default value is 50, maximum value is 1000).
Any endpoint that supports offset / limit based paging accepts limit as query parameter.

autoUpdate.description: indicates if firmware updates should be automaticly applied
indicates if firmware updates should be automaticly applied

get.summary: Lists gateways that exist in estrella system
get.description: Lists gateways that exist in estrella system

parameters.name: includeDevices
parameters.description: Defines whether result should include devices or not

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
limit on number of records on single page (default value is 50, maximum value is 1000).
Any endpoint that supports offset / limit based paging accepts limit as query parameter.

autoUpdate.description: indicates if firmware updates should be automaticly applied
indicates if firmware updates should be automaticly applied
indicates if firmware updates should be automaticly applied
indicates if firmware updates should be automaticly applied

get.summary: Gets the installation gateway aggregated status
get.description: Gets the installation gateway aggregated status

get.summary: Get installations that exist in system
get.description: Get installations that exist in system

parameters.name: includeAccessList
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will include installation access list

parameters.name: includeGateways
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will include installation gateways

parameters.name: onlyWithRemoteDiagnosticsSupport
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will display installations with remote diagnostics support

parameters.name: ownedByMaintainer
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will display installations owned by the maintainer

parameters.name: withoutViCareUser
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will display installations that do not have ViCare users (OMA)

parameters.name: onlyWithLockedDevices
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will display installations that contains any locked device

parameters.name: serial
parameters.description: The gateway, boiler or bmu serial (optional)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
limit on number of records on single page (default value is 50, maximum value is 1000).
Any endpoint that supports offset / limit based paging accepts limit as query parameter.

address.description: Address data to be used to setup the installation address

withoutOwner.description: Without owner flag to be used to register installation with or without owner

parameters.name: includeGateways
parameters.description: Defines whether result should include gateways

parameters.name: includeAccessList
parameters.description: when set to 'true' it will include installation access list

delete.summary: Removes installation from Estrella and restores its gateways to factory settings
delete.description: Removes installation from Estrella and restores its gateways to factory settings

endUserWlanCommissioned.description: Defines whether the flag endUserWlanCommissioned is set to true or false (precomissioning)
